title: Fourier Transforms: Principles and Applications - Eric W. Hansen
description:
Fourier Transforms: Principles and Applications

by Eric W. Hansen.

Pages     : 776.
Publisher : Wiley; 2014
ISBN-13   : 978-1118479148
Format    : PDF


Fourier  Transforms: Principles  and  Applications explains  transform
methods and  their applications  to electrical systems  from circuits,
antennas, and  signal processors  - ably  guiding readers  from vector
space concepts  through the Discrete Fourier  Transform (DFT), Fourier
series,  and Fourier  transform  to other  related transform  methods.

Featuring  chapter end  summaries  of key  results,  over two  hundred
examples and  four hundred homework  problems, and a  Solutions Manual
this book  is perfect for  graduate students in signal  processing and
communications as well as practicing engineers.

-_-
